name: get_random_user
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ai_random_user_generator.
Tool description: AI-based freemium API for generating random user data with AI. Like Lorem Ipsum, but for people.
API description: Fetch a random user profile based on specified criteria using the ai-random-user-generator API.

results.description: Number of user profiles to fetch. Default is '7'.

nation.description: Nationality of the users. Default is 'en_US'.

gender.description: Gender of the users. Default is 'female'.
